title: Everyday Harmonys
bio: A blue jug of flowers and an apple rest on a table while a red chair adds warmth to the scene.

title: Urban Pulse
bio: Inspired by the rhythm of city life and the geometry of architecture.

title: Whispers
bio: Soft textures and muted tones evoke a sense of quiet introspection.

title: Fragmented Memory
bio: A collage of recollections, stitched together with brush and paint.

title: Pears and Rust.
bio: A study of the often overlooked objects around us.
